UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Oyster hemocytes express a proline-rich peptide displaying synergistic antimicrobial activity with a defensin.
Literature.Author: Gueguen Y, Bernard R, Julie F, Paulina S, Delphine DG, Franck V, Philippe B, Evelyne B

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus CIP 5345(MIC=>200µM),Corynebacterium stationis CIP 104228T(MIC=>200µM),Microbacterium maritypicum CIP 105733T(MIC=>200µM),Escherichia coli SBS 363(MIC=>200µM),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=>200µM),Pectobacterium carotovorum(MIC=>200µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>200µM),Fusarium oxysporum(MIC=200µM),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=100µM)
